Dating: NAQADA II (not before); NAQADA III (not after)
Name: Stone receptacle
Description: A calcite vase dating from the Naqada II Period was part of the funerary furniture found in tomb 142 of the El-Gerza cemetery in 1910-1911excavated by the english archaeologist G.A. Wainwright. The tomb contained over sixty receptacles of which seven vases are preserved at Brussels Museum (see E.3360 and E.3361).
